name: Butthole Boss
description:
Your Boss is a butthole, he decided that he want to teach you a lesson so he halved your paycheck to teach you that "Less is more".  so you have to make him angry by cutting things in half.

Art made by Ollaster  https://ollaster.itch.io/

Cel shader used: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/flexible-cel-shader-built-in-pipeline-112979
